subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With little cash to spend in free agency, the Knicks went bargain hunting and found a nice way to cheaply bolster their backcourt in Beno Udrih, a nine-year N.B.A. veteran.
snippet: With little cash to spend in free agency, the Knicks went bargain hunting and found a nice way to cheaply bolster their backcourt in Beno Udrih, a nine-year N.B.A. veteran.
